original: intros a la ls p H1 H2. unfold pl_produit_path_incl_def_3 in *. intros n m plp H3 H4 H5 H6. specialize (H1 n m (pl_produit_1 la m ls) H3 H4 H5 H6) as [plp0 [plp1 [H7 [H8 H9]]]]. specialize (H2 n m plp0 a la ls H8 H3 H4 (le_trans H5 H9)) as [plp0' [plp1' [H10 [H11 H12]]]]. exists plp0', plp1'; auto.
